name.baseName: 轮胎生产;橡胶轮胎;硫化和测试;混合化合物

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the production stage is quite complex andincludes the processes of compound blending, rolling, extrusion, packet ring production, cutting and forming, vulcanizing, and testing. We combined closely related processes toavoid allocation. The following four main production processes were identified: compound blending, rolling and extrusion,cutting and forming, and vulcanizing and testin
生产阶段相当复杂，包括复合共混、轧制、挤出、包环生产、切割成型、硫化和测试等工艺。我们将密切相关的流程与避免分配。确定了以下四种主要生产工艺：复合共混、轧制和挤出，切割成型，硫化成型。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: “Data collected onsite in 2014 by one of the largest Chinese tire companies were used in the assessment. ”The article has stated that the data is related to 2014, but there is no specific time, so the time is set on January 1, 2014.
”评估中使用了中国最大的轮胎公司之一在2014年现场收集的数据“。文章中已说明数据调研与2014年，但没有具体时间，所以该时间定位2014年1月1日。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process concerns the production of rubber tires, which involves several complex stages. These tires are primarily used for automotive applications, providing the necessary traction and vehicle support for a variety of vehicles ranging from small passenger cars to large commercial trucks. The production process incorporates compound blending, which is essential for achieving the desired physical properties. Rolling and extrusion shape the tire into its preliminary form, while cutting and forming ready the material for vulcanizing. Vulcanization is a chemical process that enhances the elasticity and strength of the rubber. The final stage is testing, which ensures that the tires meet stringent quality and safety standards.
此工业流程涉及橡胶轮胎的生产，包含多个复杂阶段。这些轮胎主要应用于汽车领域，为各种从小型乘用车到大型商用卡车的车辆提供必要的牵引力和车辆支持。生产过程包括复合共混，这对于实现期望的物理特性是至关重要的。轧制和挤出将轮胎成型为初步形态，而切割成型为硫化作准备。硫化是一种化学过程，可以增强橡胶的弹性和强度。最后的测试阶段确保轮胎符合严格的质量和安全标准。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data on the raw materials used in the investigated tire product were sourced from on-site investigations of one of the largest Chinese tire companies. The data were collected in 2014 during the manufacture of the target tire product.Other materials, such as active clay, zinc oxide, stearic acid, processing agent, and lubricating oil, were also considered.
调查轮胎产品中使用的原材料数据来源于中国最大轮胎公司之一的现场调查。这些数据是在2014年目标轮胎产品制造期间收集的。还考虑了其他材料，如活性粘土、氧化锌、硬脂酸、加工剂和润滑油。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.
Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) purposes, it is important to note that the data is specific to the year 2014 and reflects practices from one of the largest Chinese tire companies of that time. Users should be aware that changes in manufacturing technology or raw material sourcing over time might influence the applicability of this dataset to current practices. Additionally, data users should take into account that the data pertains to the production processes without allocation, meaning the impacts of each stage were not distributed across the connected processes. It is recommended to check for updates or more recent data that may represent current production technologies and to use this dataset accordingly for retrospective analyses.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，重要的是注意数据是2014年的具体情况，并反映了当时中国最大轮胎公司的做法。用户应该意识到，随着时间的推移，制造技术或原料获取的变化可能会影响这些数据集对当前做法的适用性。此外，数据用户应考虑到数据涉及未分配产生的生产过程，即每个阶段的影响没有在相关流程中分配。建议检查更新或更近期的数据，可能代表当前生产技术，相应地使用此数据集进行回顾性分析。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Waste wire cord fabric,Waste steel wire
